Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to the water board's power to fix, revise, charge and collect, and enforce payment
Summary: Relates to the water board's power to fix, revise, charge and collect and enforce the payment of fees, rates, rents and other service charges for the use of, or services furnished, rendered, or made available.
LawCode: Amd ยง1045-g, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the New York city water board
